Articles.Content: So I am finally moving from soley owning a Macbook Pro to an actual working desktop with Windows! So my question is once I get it up and running will I have to repurchase KSP for Windows if I already purchased it and downloaded it for Mac on Steam?
no steam remembers you as a user who owns this game
Make sure you write down your used Email-Adress, Username and Password though before you Switch over.
